comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.20) Gecko/20081217 Firefox/2.0.0.20
Build Identifier: eGain mail 2004

Logon to admin console. Go to Group Module and click the Group on tree. Click the Autorization tab

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Click Group Node on Tree
2.Select any existing record
3.Click the Authorization Tab

Actual Results:  
Busy cursor is found

Expected Results:  
Roloe , User should be visible in Authorization tab
